HomePage.title: Welcome to Graphiql App by Unit team

description.title: REST/GraphiQL Client
description.subtitle: Project description
description.text: This project is a lightweight application combining the functionalities of Postman and GraphiQL into a single interface. The application allows users to execute requests to RESTful and GraphQL APIs, providing a convenient tool for interacting with any open APIs.
list: Authorization and Authentication - Access to the application is restricted to authorized users only
Request History - Ability to save and re-run previous requests.
RESTful Client - Supports HTTP method selection, URL input, header editing, request body editing, and response display
GraphiQL Client - Supports URL input, query and variable editing, header editing, and documentation exploration via SDL.

Form.password-spec-char: Must be at least 1 special character (!@#$%^&*)

FirebaseErrors.auth/email-already-in-use: This email is already in use
FirebaseErrors.auth/invalid-password: Password must be longer than 6 characters
FirebaseErrors.auth/network-request-failed: Unable to connect to authentication server
FirebaseErrors.auth/permission-denied: You do not have enough permissions
